ORIGINAL RESEARCH ARTICLE
Front. Genet., 29 January 2019 | https://doi.org/10.3389/fgene.2019.00009
McImpute: Matrix Completion Based Imputation for Single Cell RNA-seq Data
Aanchal Mongia1, Debarka Sengupta1,2* and Angshul Majumdar3
